DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , two-way crossover study assess tolerability pharmacokinetics Tacrobell® Tab . Prograf® Cap . single oral dose healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study . 2 . Healthy male volunteer age 20 45 year old . 3 . Body weight ≥ 55 kg 30.0kg/m2 ≥ BMI ≥ 18.0kg/m2 1. presence history clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , pulmonary , metabolic , endocrine , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological , psychiatric disease 2. chronic disease might interfere resorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug , major surgery gastrointestinal tract except appendectomy 3. history drug hypersensitivity ( especially active inactive ingredient tacrolimus preparation ) 4. administration cyclosporine Bosentan 5. administration potassium spar diuretic 6 . Subjects galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption 7 . SBP > 150 mmHg < 90 mmHg 8 . DBP > 100 mmHg < 50 mmHg 9. positive serologic finding human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , and/or hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody , RPR 10 . AST ALT > 1.5*ULN , eGFR < 80 mL/min 11. history drug abuse positive drug screen test 12. intake administration ethical herbal medication medication within 2 week , intake administration OTC vitamin preparation 13. medication metabolize enzyme inducer inhibitor barbital within 1 month first dose 14. administration another study medication within 3 month first dose 15. blood donation 2 month , component blood donation within 1 month blood transfusion first dose 16 . Alcohol > 21 units/week stop drinking study 17 . Cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day stop smoking hospitalization 18. consumption beverage food contain caffeine ( e.g.coffee , tea ) hospitalization 19. consumption grapefruit food contain grapefruit hospitalization 20 . Not eligible participate study discretion investigator .
